subject: Some questions. :)))
description_text:
Hello. I am ordering the Simsonn Plux x pedals to sweden.
Specifically the ”Plus X P2-H2 Black without Baseplate”.

Will the pedals automatically be shipped from Germany so there will be no import tax?

Are there yellow, red, blue or green springs for the break pedal included in the Plux X package? Or do you have to buy all springs separate.

conversations.body_text: Hi Gustav Wessbladh,      Yes, you can purchase on our official website. We will ship directly from Germany to you, with no customs duties required.
